verbose_text: Under conditions of oxidative stress (H 2 O 2 treatment), APOPT1-HA protein increased to immunodetectable levels, with a maximum at 24 hr (XREF_FIG C); no protein was detected following treatment with staurosporine (data not shown).
evidence: APOPT1-HA protein increased to immunodetectable levels, with a maximum at 24 hr
